title: Lighter Than Air
description: Lighter than Air is a fascinating history of floating aircraft. Topics range from the discovery of Montgolfier Gas to the flight of the Goodyear Blimp. Both the photographs and the details in the text are of high interest to children. Many teaching opportunities are provided throughout the book.
highFrequencyWords: aircraft, airship, atmosphere, blimps, demonstration, density, dirigible, experiment, gas, molecule, technical, zeppelin
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
